Key Match Events: San Antonio Spurs held a 105-89 advantage with 4:26 to go when Stephon Castle left the floor for a brief rest.
San Antonio's defense clamped down in the third quarter led by Victor Wembanyama and Stephon Castle.
Pre-Game Insights: An injury to forward Jeremy Sochan forced the San Antonio Spurs to insert Stephon Castle into the starting lineup.
Post-Match Reflections: San Antonio is now 2-2 with its lottery pick in the starting lineup following their rout of the Sacramento Kings on Monday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Stephon Castle had a career-high 23 points against the Utah Jazz on Saturday.
Stephon Castle helped San Antonio to a 60-55 lead at halftime.
Others: Stephon Castle and the San Antonio Spurs hosted the Sacramento Kings on Monday.
Stephon Castle went 3-for-5, including 1-for-2 from deep for seven first-quarter points.
